gist.headline: Simplifying the hive
gist.blurb: We're streamlining our development workflow by removing complex subtree syncing. One repo, less friction.
gist.summary: Removed the legacy Polly subtree synchronization workflow to focus development directly within the monorepo.
gist.impact: Reduces CI/CD complexity and simplifies the contribution flow for maintainers.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot and robot tidying up a server room, removing unnecessary cables. Represents simplifying the infrastructure.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot and a cute robot tidying up a server room, unplugging a tangled cable. Lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Organized and clean.
